verbose_text: In the absence of TGF-beta1, CMS not only reduced the synthesis of COL1A1 (P < 0.05), COL3A1 (P < 0.05) and elastin (P < 0.05), but also promoted their degradation through the inhibition of the expression of TIMP-2 (P < 0.05) and the promotion of the expression of MMP-2/9 (P < 0.05).
evidence: CMS not only reduced the synthesis of COL1A1 (P<0.05), COL3A1 (P<0.05) and elastin
